explains: int. （表示同意、理解或给出肯定答案）嗯-哼

sentences.en: "Uh-huh," they murmured when we tripped over the door saddle or ruined our clothes.
sentences.cn: 当我们被门槛绊倒或者磨损了自己的衣服时，他们会咕哝着：“啊哈”。

sentences.en: They might say, "Uh-huh, uh-huh, uh-huh" or look at their watch or scan the surroundings or fidget.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会说“啊-哈，啊-哈，啊-哈”，或者看着他们的手表，或者四处张望，或者坐立不安。
